variations.name: Speak Number Guessing
variations.description: Number guessing game where you speak your guess into the microphone using the speech recognition API
specs: Display UI directing user to speak guess
Implement speech recognition to listen to mic
Process user's guess and match
Let user know higher, lower, match or not a number
troubleshooting: This component is using the experimental Speech Recognition API which is only available in Chrome and not on all platforms. If you are having issues with this component, try using Chrome on a desktop.
In FireFox, you need to enable the experimental Web Speech API in about:config - media.webspeech.recognition.force_enable
